title: 配置开发环境recomlieMC阶段出错
author: MorFog
txt_content:
:remapMcSources SKIPPED
:recompileMc FAILED

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':recompileMc'.
> Unable to find a javac compiler;
com.sun.tools.javac.Main is not on the classpath.
Perhaps JAVA_HOME does not point to the JDK.
It is currently set to "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_161"

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
JDK安装 以及环境变量设置可能有问题
参考www.runoob.com/java/java-environment-setup.html

replies.author: MorFog
replies.txt_content:
GiNYAi 发表于 2018-2-28 11:14
JDK安装 以及环境变量设置可能有问题
参考www.runoob.com/java/java-environment-setup.html
 ...
（大问题已经解决，之后准备降级到JAVA8）
